title: Luxe Nashik Radisson Stay near Pandav Caves with Daily Breakfast
description: At the foothills of the two-millennia-old Pandav Caves, just three hours from Mumbai off the Nashik-Mumbai highway, you'll find the luxurious Radisson Blu Hotel & Spa, Nashik standing proudly. A contemporary hotel by Radisson's iconic brand, in India's wine capital, this is the only address you need to know when you are in Nashik. Offering unparalleled views of the Trirashmi Hills, easy access from Gujarat or Maharashtra and a location just 10 minutes from the Nashik city centre, this 42,000sqm hotel is the ultimate city escape. First-time visitors and return travellers to Nashik will equally enjoy this gorgeous Radisson Blu Hotel & Spa hotel for its proximity to the city's famed attractions, including Trimbakeshwar Temple, Dadasaheb Phalke Museum and more.
offer_address: CTS No 289, 2, Vikrikar Bhavan Rd, Pathardi Phata, Nashik, Maharashtra 422010

title: Grand Opening: Adults-Only Nashik Wellness Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily Yoga
description:
You can't get any closer to nirvana than the newly opened Viveda Wellness Village near Nashik, the holy city of Maharashtra. Located just under four hours from Mumbai and scattered across a lush 40-acre landscape, with the Sahyadri Mountains and Lake Beze serving as a breathtaking backdrop, this brand-new wellness retreat is perfect for those who want to connect with nature and escape city life.

An all-inclusive, adults-only paradise, Viveda Wellness Village offers a luxurious stay that promises to lighten your soul and revitalise your body with holistic therapies, wellness treatments and wholesome vegetarian cuisine. Let the natural surroundings of this tranquil resort, home to just 16 handcrafted cottages with flower gardens and a location close to Trimbakeshwar Shiva Temple and the Anjaneri Hills, soothe your soul.
